snippet: A prominent activist is canceling a trip to the United States to receive a democracy award, to show solidarity with colleagues whose passports have apparently been denied.
abstract: Min Ko Naing, prominent activist in Myanmar, is canceling a trip to the United States to receive a democracy award, to show solidarity with colleagues whose passports have apparently been denied.
lead_paragraph: A prominent activist is canceling a trip to the United States to receive a democracy award, to show solidarity with colleagues whose passports have apparently been denied.

headline.seo: Myanmar Activist Says He’s Canceling Trip to U.S.
